humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, 11 sentinel lymph nodes were examined and all were found to be negative for tumor (0/11). Based on the new rules provided, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes (New Rule 10) or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma (New Rule 11). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that 12 sentinel lymph nodes were examined (1 from part 1 and 11 from part 2) and all were negative for tumor (0/1 and 0/11). This means that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage. The substaging information (like N0a, N0b, etc.) is not provided in this report, so we can only determine the main N stage.
